summary: The Stone Orcs (Roq) are the subjugated slave-race of the Orcs. Bigger, Tougher, Stronger
descriptionHtml:
Generations of working in mines have caused the pigment in the skin of these Orcs to fade. The intense physical labor has made them larger and more hardy. They have a Health Regen Rate comparable to Frost Trolls and will regen at that rate in combat. Their Berserker rage has changed into a Blind Fury that damages their Health and Stamina, but can be used repetitively.

Includes a Follower--Kromaq the Crusher. Essential. Level Scaling. Full Dwarven Armor
In the Bannerred Mare

Block 10
Heavy Armor 10
Smithing 15
Health 150
Magicka 25
350 Carry Weight
Base Unarmed Damage 10  

Version 1.0.0 Launch

Version 1.2.0: 
Kromaq\'s Journal added (teaches Heavy Armor Skill). 
Stagger effect added to Blind Fury
Made Kromaq slightly stronger

Version 1.2.1
Blind Fury no longer adds night eye
Now does 50 damage to health
Costs 25 magicka

Doesn\'t work well with /player.setrace command or /showracemenu. For the most consistant results, I would suggest a new file. However, if you insist on using the developer console, use /showracemenu and cycle through the presets. For reasons unknown to me, this unlocks all of the face morph options. Oh, and I would suggest not riding your horse off of a cliff. This race will not ragdoll while your still alive. It just becomes really buggy and annoying.

If anyone has any suggestions for improvements to this mod, then please feel free to leave them in the comments.
author: Cbrooks1992
